downloadTitle: Windows 10 Education classroom laptop and charging cart tips poster
downloadDescription: A poster sized checklist for K-12 classrooms with tips (best practices) for managing classroom laptops and charging carts to ensure smooth and contiuous operation.
detailsSection: A PDF file of a poster for display in classrooms with laptops and charging carts. The poster contains a list of tips, or best practices, for maintaining Windows 10 laptops and carts for optimal and continuous operation. The checklist poster is formatted in a friendly and colorful chalkboard depiction, suitable for display in proximity to charging carts in K-12 classrooms.
installInstructionSection: The poster can be printed at ANSI-D size (22in. x 34in.), which will require a plotter or professional print shop, or at ANSI-B size, which is standard 11in. x 17in. tabloid size.
